fullText: This biodrama about the Clintons during the 2008 Democratic primary feels both rushed and static, despite committed performances by Laurie Metcalf and John Lithgow.
dtliExcerpt: This biodrama about the Clintons during the 2008 Democratic primary feels both rushed and static, despite committed performances by Laurie Metcalf and John Lithgow.
